name: HousingSecurityOrStability
title: Housing Security or Stability
description: Determination of whether the person has limited or uncertain access to stable, safe, adequate, and affordable housing. If homeless, indication of whether sheltered or unsheltered. (Business ID: Entry 2855687)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Housing Security or Stability .),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person has limited or uncertain access to stable, safe, adequate, and affordable housing. if homeless, indication of whether sheltered or unsheltered..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Housing Security or Stability .),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Housing Security or Stability .)
